# idOS Enclave

[![Vercel](https://therealsujitk-vercel-badge.vercel.app/?app=idos-enclave)](https://idos-enclave.vercel.app) ![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue?&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

A secure browser context for password input, key derivation, encryption and decryption, and local storage.
